component:
#This XML structure defines a component related to inspection profile management within a development environment. #Specifies the version of the inspection file #sets an option named myName with the value Project Default. Denote's the profile's name or description.
"""This section configures an inspection tool for detecting unresolved references in Python code. class="PyUnresolvedReferencesInspection": Specifies the class or type of inspection tool. In this case, it's checking for unresolved references in Python code. enabled="true": Indicates that the inspection tool is enabled. level="WARNING": Sets the severity level for the inspection tool to WARNING. It might generate warning messages for unresolved references. enabled_by_default="true": Indicates that this inspection tool is enabled by default in the project settings."""
# Defines an option for ignored identifiers in the inspection tool. #Specifies a list of ignored identifiers. #Adds an identifier ("user_id") to the list of ignored identifiers for this specific inspection tool. #This means that occurrences of "user_id" won't trigger warnings or notifications about unresolved references.
